title: PETITION to give the LEGENDARY Lunar Eclipse to Diana and make it into a VS Event
body:
_**ALL THOSE IN FAVOR**_

1.VOTE BELOW
2.UPVOTE THIS THREAD
3.AND COMMENT SOMETHING NICE IF YOU WANT

https://i.imgur.com/ZDrojJK.jpg


**☆UPDATE**: As of right now the Petition Has 

672 => **Yes**
118 =>  _No_

**Thnx to Everyone That Voted Keep it up supporting the Rightful Cause**



_**MOON JUSTICE**_

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Spooky when long dead threads come back from the grave!

While the art of thread necromancy can be useful in some cases, this unfortunately, is not one of those times. I am putting this poor zombie back gently into that good night. 

RIP thread.

The existence of Solar Eclipse Leona and Lunar Eclipse Leona doesn't prevent Solar Eclipse Diana and / or Lunar Eclipse Diana from existing. 

I agree that they would make a good VS skin set, .. but why not just have both?

The concept art you have here is colored like Solar Eclipse Leona, and I would assume that it would be Solar Eclipse Diana. 

The color pallet for Lunar Eclipse Leona is actually really similar to Diana's default colors already.

If they were to make this a VS matchup, I would prefer to see Solar Eclipse Diana and Lunar Eclipse Leona. 

Even from a thematic perspective this would make the most sense to me. During a lunar eclipse, the Earth is blocking the sunlight from the moon. From a theological perspective, the Sun is withholding it's power from the Moon. During a solar eclipse, the Moon is blocking the sunlight from the Earth. The Moon is taking power from the Sun. 

I would still prefer to just see both get both skins.

Well why don't we make it a Solar Eclipse Leona and Solar Eclipse Diana VS Lunar Eclipse Leona nd Lunar Eclipse Diana? Make it the theme that is the VS not particularly the champions? But just spitballing.

That would be fine, but the facts right now is that Leona is already available and Diana is most likely not. 

It sounds to me like most people that are complaining want only one new Leona skin, and they want a Diana skin instead of the second Leona skin. 

I would prefer to encourage Riot to release both skins for Leona now, then pressure them to release their counterparts for Diana later.

Yeah like I understand people being upset, but Riot already made the skins which take alot of time, and I agree that it would take too long to make the Diana counterparts. I just wish they stopped everyone's project and made the Diana counterparts and the VS event in like 1 month, but I know that is unrealistic.

Do people think riot can just click lunar eclipse Leona and rename it to lunar eclipse Diana at this point??? 
They would have to start from point 0 if they wanted to make lunar eclipse Diana. It would literally take months to finish. 
Also Diana has a bunch of amazing skins so it's not like she is one of those ignored champions that get a skin every 5 years.
And I'm not saying they shouldn't do lunar eclipse Diana or whatever but it just isn't as simple as this thread seems to imply.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

They can't just scrap the lunar eclipse skin for Leona and just put it on Diana just like that.

It'd take several months til they made the skin(s) for Diana.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-11-07T18:34:44.189+0000)
>
> They can't just scrap the lunar eclipse skin for Leona and just put it on Diana just like that.
> 
> It'd take several months til they made the skin(s) for Diana.

Lol people are downvoting you for stating the truth. How sad is that?

Guys, i'm all for Diana getting skins for a VS event, but don't beg Riot to scrap the Lunar Eclipse Leona skin because of it. That's not fair for those like myself who LOVE both Solar and Lunar. Let Leona have her skins, then hope for Riot to give Diana skins later on. She recently got a skin regardless, the Bloodborn- I mean Dark Waters skin and now Leona's getting her Dark Soul- I mean Eclipse skins!

Uh. Not happening.

This isn't like "Peel off the skin, remove he shield, slap it on Diana". You would need to _heavily_ change the skin down to the very core of the skin from particles to voice to the damn skeleton, considering it's a legendary. 

I'd much rather Riot release another lego Solar/Lunar eclipse Diana.

No. The existence of Leona's skins does not prevent Diana from getting skins. Have some patience, especially since Diana recently got a skin (Dark Waters Diana) regardless of whether you like the skin or not. Diana is slated for a full VGU (visual and gameplay update), and will most likely get a very nice skin or two after the release of that. 

Do not delay Leona's skins. The two do not need to be constantly entwined in lore. I didn't see this outrage when Diana got Blood Moon, Dark Waters, and other skins.

> [{quoted}](name=FrostbittnSeeker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-07T17:36:55.349+0000)
>
>I didn't see this outrage when Diana got Blood Moon, Dark Waters, and other skins.

Because Leona has nothing to do with those skins while a lunar eclipse does with diana. It's pretty damn obvious.

You do realize the point of skins is to play out a different fantasy from their base right?

It makes plenty sense if you think outside “LEONA IS THE SUN AND SHOULD ONLY GET SUN RELATED SKINS”

> [{quoted}](name=Spank the Fox,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-11-08T00:56:34.158+0000)
>
> You do realize the point of skins is to play out a different fantasy from their base right?


So where's my demacian riven skin because logic no longer applies to champion background it seems fit to make one.  


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Noxus Poppy exists, your argument is weak.

I am not sure what to vote for. Do you want Riot to give Lunar Eclipse skin to Diana INSTEAD of Leona? Then I would vote "no", I want that Leona skin. Do you want them to give the skin to Diana as well as keeping Leona her skins and make the VS event? Then I would vote "yes".
That's a brilliant idea.
Yes, Leona deserves a legendary, BUT SO DOES DIANA.
Made Leona a legendary now make Diana's a Ultimate and we gucci.

YES
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
How about Leona keeps both skins, but Diana also gets both skins? That'd be awesome.
Would have been nicer but too late now since they are done. :D

Diana got Infernal (2016) , Bloodmoon (2017), and Dark Water (2018) which are all 1350 skins

Leona's last skin was Barbeque in 2016, which is a 750 skin. Leona deserves a little solo love.

Anyway it just doesnt make sense logistically, Riot would have to build a 1820 skin from the ground up, on top of building a ton more lore, icons, borders, loot, etc. on top of the VS. event im sure thats already underway.

Also VS. events are between champs in the same role. Yas and Riven are both hypermobile AD skirmishers. Garen and Darius are both immobile juggernauts. Leona vs. Diana doesnt work.

Yes, the fact that the leona skin already has a perfect special interaction with diana even proves the point even more. I mean lunar eclipse leo is a beautiful skin but cmon they HAD to see the backlash coming, leona is known for the sun and diana is known for the moon...

I do not know _what_ Riot was thinking creating these skins without even thinking about Diana. Did they forget about her? Do they no longer care about her? We have loved Diana versus Leona before the versus even existed. I get Riot has become more and more about money, so you'd think they'd make even more skins and a versus event for Leona and Diana to milk more money out of it. The Leona skin is very high quality, but disappointing that Diana isn't even considered.
I WOULD BUY THE SKIN DIRECTLY bcz Diana is my main xD
YES I DONT SEE WHY NOT. LEONA DOESNT NEED 2 LEGENDARIES BUT A VS EVENT WITH DIANA AND LEONA SOUNDS WAYY MORE HYPE AND MAKES MORE SENSE. PLEASE RIOT GIVE DIANA A LEGENDARY SKIN AND A VS EVENT

Leona the character who hasn't gotten a skin in two years and only has one that changes effects surely deserves this ONE legendary. How do people not understand that its not two. Yeah they have different effects and SLIGHTLY different splash arts, but they're the same base skin, with a slight tweak to the theme with the same animations and everything. It's not like Dunkmaster and God King, where its two random themes on the same character. No its like Lancer Blitz, where its two variants of the same theme. They're not two ground up things, Its Solar Eclipse and the Lunar bonus.

> [{quoted}](name= Irrompible,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=00440001,timestamp=2018-11-10T08:37:42.343+0000)
>
> Leona the character who hasn't gotten a skin in two years and only has one that changes effects surely deserves this ONE legendary. How do people not understand that its not two. Yeah they have different effects and SLIGHTLY different splash arts, but they're the same base skin, with a slight tweak to the theme with the same animations and everything. It's not like Dunkmaster and God King, where its two random themes on the same character. No its like Lancer Blitz, where its two variants of the same theme. They're not two ground up things, Its Solar Eclipse and the Lunar bonus.

They could've made diana one as well. Instead they make 2 leona legendaries. They had an opportunity for an amazing vs event.

You literally ignored everything I wrote. It would’ve been twice the work to make Diana one. Everyone is acting like leona got two whole legendaries but she didn’t, They’re variants, not separate things. And besides Diana already got a skin this year while Leona’s been shadted two years in a row, Leona(and Leona) players deserve this. No one cried about how poorly Leona is treated when Diana got another skin before leona, so treat that the same way.

Dude all I'm saying is that riot could've given a legendary to diana as well as leona and made a vs event. Instead of capitalising on that opportunity they gave leona 2 legendaries when diana couldve gotten one as well

They did not give Leona two legendaries. They geve Leona one, and then a variant. Stop making it seem like Leona got two ground up skins. She did not. They couldn’t have given one to Diana, because they didn’t make two skins. They’d have had to have made another actual legendary, ie bring in a whole new voice actor, make an entirely new model, make new sound effects, new visual effects, new animations, and a completely new splash art.

The only thing different between the Leona variants is particle color, her sword is a little different, and some slight tweaks to her the crown and her hair. Everything else is the same.

You didn't even read my comment. I'm saying they missed out on an opportunity to have a vs event by giving diana a skin and it makes more sense for diana to get a skin as well instead of leona getting 2 legendaries
I did read it, and I explained why they couldn’t have “just” given Diana one, and how Leona does not have two legendaries. She has one with a variant.

> [{quoted}](name= Irrompible,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=00440001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-10T22:56:50.539+0000)
>
> I did read it, and I explained why they couldn’t have “just” given Diana one, and how Leona does not have two legendaries. She has one with a variant.

They didn't need to give leona 2 legendaries it makes no sense when they couldve just given diana one and made a vs event. Thats what the petition is for. For a vs event instead of giving leona 2

My god man, they did not give Leona two legendaries. Stop saying that. A legendary has a unique model with a unique voice with new animations effects sounds and splash arts. Of those, the only thing different is the effect colors and slight tweaks to the art. Everything else is the same. It’s not two legendaries. It’s a variant, nothing more. Hell even buying one drastically reduces the price of the other. If that doesn’t show that they’re variants then there’s no hope you’ll understand that. 

Diana doesn’t “deserve” this legendary. Diana has been getting consistent high quality skins, where as Leona has gone 2 years without one and only has one that changes effects. Stop saying Leona doesnt deserve anything and stop saying Diana deserves this. Leona has gone long enough to surely get her first legendary. 

You act like they can just take it off Leona and slap it on Diana, when that’s laughably incorrect. They’d have to remodel everything, get entirely new sounds, hire a voice actress, make new animations, everything. Where as they can tweak a few things and give Leona fans a nice little bonus, that’s all it is. Yet cry baby Diana mains come in crying that Diana is neglected and oh riot hates her, oh Leona doesn’t deserve this my character does. It’s childish close minded and selfish.

Dude they couldve made a vs event for diana and leona like they did with garen and darius but they gave leona 2 legendaries for no reason. Thats why this thread exists for people to petition for a diana legendary and a vs event. Leona doesn't need 2 legendaries. Give diana one instead 1 legendary is enough for leona. I know darius has 2 but leona doesn't need 2

> [{quoted}](name=Meryem,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=00440001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-11T04:51:32.821+0000)
>
> Thats why this thread exists for people to petition for a diana legendary and a vs event.

What he said 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

People saying no on the poll have no interest in the game lore and havent even read one word of it. Because then you would know that this skin belongs to Diana.
Its like making a Star Guarding skin for Kha'Zix, Rek'Sai and Cho'Gath. Although SG Rek'Sai would be cool right?

> [{quoted}](name=FNC 6ixGOD,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-11-07T19:21:38.985+0000)
>
> People saying no on the poll have no interest in the game lore and havent even read one word of it. Because then you would know that this skin belongs to Diana.
> Its like making a Star Guarding skin for Kha'Zix, Rek'Sai and Cho'Gath. Although SG Rek'Sai would be cool right?

So we should remove all skins related to fire and give them to brand because acording to the lore they belong to him? thats just stupid. Diana will get an skin when its her turn.

This isnt a "Nami is a water champion so only she should get a pool party skin" case.

In the lore Leona is a fighter for the Solari and Diana fights for the Lunari.
The skins are called: LUNAR AND SOLAR.
As Leona doesnt fight for the Lunari, why would she have a skin that represents it.
Diana fights for the Lunari so her representing it would be the logic choice.

This is like giving an ice skin to Maokai while it fits Anivia more, since ice has nothing to do with Maokai and everything with Anivia.
Same goes here for Leona, she has nothing to do with Lunari, and Diana basicly IS Lunari. Giving her the Lunar skin is just ment to be.

> [{quoted}](name=FNC 6ixGOD,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2018-11-07T21:26:38.878+0000)
>
> This isnt a "Nami is a water champion so only she should get a pool party skin" case.
> 
> In the lore Leona is a fighter for the Solari and Diana fights for the Lunari.
> The skins are called: LUNAR AND SOLAR.
> As Leona doesnt fight for the Lunari, why would she have a skin that represents it.
> Diana fights for the Lunari so her representing it would be the logic choice.
> 
> This is like giving an ice skin to Maokai while it fits Anivia more, since ice has nothing to do with Maokai and everything with Anivia.
> Same goes here for Leona, she has nothing to do with Lunari, and Diana basicly IS Lunari. Giving her the Lunar skin is just ment to be.

· Thats the whole point of skins, giving the champions something diferent, Just so you know both maokai and zyra have fire skins and anivia too. we got ice brand and ice annie. We even got a noxus Poppy or Mecha Aurelion sol (do you think a Godlike dragon as big as a galaxy is something that could be made out of metal by some humans?)

· Why do you even want another moon based diana skin anyways, she alredy has 4, its boring and repetitive. 
Blood MOON diana, LUNAR goddess Diana, Classic Diana (that its obviosly moon themed) and Dark Valkyrie Diana (that its just a darker version of the classic one).

· Diana only has a non-moon themed skin; we need more of those: Forest Diana, Robot Diana, Dinosaur Diana, Train driver Diana, whatever.  We dont need Moon Diana #5. At least the dudes asking for Sun Diana have a point.. a stupid point because that would be too similar to the fire one but still...

· Recoloring an alredy existing Leona skin into purple its obviosly way easier than designing a whole new skin for Diana for an alredy overused theme on her.

The problem here is that you're mixing up troll skins an real skins.
Infernal Amumu is a fictional skin.
All of the skins you have mentioned are fun skins.
This isnt a fun troll skin and actually follows the lore.

Nobody cares its an overused theme on Diana, any player that plays Diana would have welcomed this skin over any other.

Also, they can make skins that fit her really well like the one they made for Leona but shouldve made for Diana. And can also pick her for another skin line that is coming out soon. Since Ahri, Jhin and MF can have 3.4 trillion skins per minute, why cant Diana have 2 in 1 year?

I greet you sir.

Skins are part of a different universe.
Diana might get this skin later.
I dont play Diana often, but if the skin came out I wouldve been interested. I just hope she gets it soon for all the Diana mains out there.

> [{quoted}](name=Myozthirirn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2018-11-07T20:27:03.303+0000)
>
> So we should remove all skins related to fire and give them to brand because according to the lore they belong to him? thats just stupid. Diana will get an skin when its her turn.

Lol thats not what he meant and you know it. Leona and Diana are natural enemies. It makes complete sense that ECLIPSE would be revolved around Diana and Leona

While it would've been amazing(And I honestly expected a Solar/Lunar eclipse Vs event next year when they work on Diana/Leo), we're getting what we're getting.  Not gonna change at this point.  Best hope now is to plead for Diana to one day get it IN ADDITION to the current Leona ones.

Side Note - (Pre-Lunari) Solari Diana please.

The thing is that there's no point in making a VS event.

Diana and Leona are not enemies, infact Leona wants to cooperate with Diana because solar and lunar are two sides of the same coin.

I still want to see a Solar Eclipse Diana skin, but making it into a VS event won't make sense.

I think it is a bit late for that. We already know that skins are planned months in advance. Honestly, we know a Diana rework is coming next year so maybe that is why they just blew it off? I am not sure though.

> [{quoted}](name=KingBlackthorn1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2YQAmNbK,comment-id=002b,timestamp=2018-11-08T07:40:02.933+0000)
>
> I think it is a bit late for that. We already know that skins are planned months in advance. Honestly, we know a Diana rework is coming next year so maybe that is why they just blew it off? I am not sure though.

Can you give me link where it's sad there will be rework? Thanks!

I say no because Diana has gotten many good skins over her time and Leona honestly has gotten bottom of the barrel scraps

It has been 8 years of waiting for Leona to even get VFX of a different color than Yellow

Diana: Lunar Goddess, Infernal, Blood Moon, Dark Waters. All very well done skins

Leona: Pool Party and PROJECT are pretty much her only decent skins and those are beyond old

She deserves these skins to herself

Also when they made these Leona skins the theme was just eclipse but when they showed both concepts and asked for Leona testers to choose one, there was so much love for both Riot made both
